title: Opening ‘Pandora’s box’: What happens if the US attacks Venezuela?
description: Experts warn a US strike on Venezuela could trigger instability rather than a peaceful transition.
content:
As United States naval deployments in the Caribbean intensify and rhetoric heats up, the prospect of a US attack on Venezuela feels increasingly close.
Since early September, the US has carried out … [+11212 chars]
